name: Honesty Dataset Generator
description: Generates synthetic honesty training datasets covering the full -2 to +2 rubric spectrum

topic.title: Topic/Domain
topic.description: Domain for dataset generation (e.g., science, coding, history, general)

reward_distribution.title: Reward Distribution
reward_distribution.description: balanced = equal distribution across -2 to +2; custom = use reward_mix parameter

reward_mix.title: Custom Reward Mix (JSON)
reward_mix.description: JSON object defining count for each reward level when reward_distribution=custom

include_search_hints.title: Include Search Hints
include_search_hints.description: Embed [SEARCH:query] markers for downstream search augmentation

long_form.title: Long Form Answers
long_form.description: Allow answers >220 tokens for detailed explanations
